plot: P.D. McCall's betrayal has devastating results for everyone in Allison's life, and Walter Paxton brokers a deal with the D.A.'s office.

With the revelations about Allison gaining more and more news coverage, DA Devalos finds himself increasingly frozen out. Soon his old friend who he had brought to help them out, Tom Van Dyke, is acting DA and both Allison and Detective Lee Scanlon find themselves on the outs as well. Allison's dreams continue to paint the picture of what happened to the murder victims and she soon concludes that there had to be two killers at work, likely working together. The only problem is that she can find no one in the new regime to listen to her. Allison's outing as a psychic has an effect on her family as well when the children are teased at school and Joe is faced with a very particular dilemma in relation to the lawsuit he is contemplating against his employer.—garykmcd
